name: I Wanna Be the Best Guy
name_original: I Wanna Be the Best Guy
description:
I Wanna Be the Best Guy is a tribute to the infamous 2D platformer 'I Wanna Be the Guy'.

The game consists of a parody of the original game(IWBTG), and numerous Korean Internet memes of early 2010's.

※ This game is currently available in Korean(한국어) only.
